title: toki
description: A modular monte-carlo ray tracing renderer that runs on the CPU and supports multithreading. A pet-project that I had created, to learn more about computer graphics and to understand the implementation of various legacy as well as modern global illumination methods.

title: Aether
caption: Amongst the clouds lies a world to be discovered
description: A co-op multiplayer adventure game with a unique premise - the world around you is only visible to you beneath your feet. Made for a game development module over the span of three months, written in Unity.
